BIO

I am a Ui/Ux designer and developer with the passion to create meaningful experiences for people and sophisticated digital solutions through design. Currently working with the knowledge of tools like Figma, Adobe Suite, Balsamiq and frontend developing skills of HTML CSS, Bootstrap and Javascript. I have constant goal of pushing boundaries with detailed design thinking and learning new skills that can challenge me to grow into more experienced designer.
